## Intro to R 

```{r}
# install.packages('tidyverse')
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data('iris')
head(iris)
```

## Running A Regression 

Logistic Regression
```{r}
iris <- iris %>% mutate(is_setosa = ifelse(Species == 'setosa', 1, 0))
```

```{r}
logistic_regression_model <- glm(is_setosa ~ Sepal.Length, data = iris, family = 'binomial')
```

```{r}
summary(logistic_regression_model)
```
